AI Description: deal.II is an open-source finite element library designed to solve partial differential equations using adaptive mesh refinement and advanced finite element techniques.
Core Features: Supports A Wide Range Of Finite Element Computations, Parallel Computing Capabilities, Adaptive Mesh Refinement, Provides A Collection Of Example Programs & Tutorials, High Level Of Flexibility & Extensibility
General Tags: Finite Element Library, Partial Differential Equations, Adaptive Mesh Refinement, Open-Source, Computational Science
